channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Kevin Cui

item.title: Replace 8 Frequently Used Linux Commands!?
item.description: .lnt { display: none } Almost a decade ago, I started to touch the command-line interface (CLI). I’m now a nerdy CLI lover and I’m so obsessed by its efficiency. Therefore, I’m always trying out new command-line commands. From time to time, some commands are replaced by other improved ones in my daily workflow. Especially for some frequently used commands, it’s worth to find better alternatives. Here is a list of improved commands I’d like to share with you:
